about_the_game:
THE LIGHT OF THE DARKNESS: ORIGINS – Soar, Explore, Conquer! Unleash your inner warrior in this mesmerizing action RPG, uniquely enhanced by a groundbreaking physics-based flying mechanic. Glide through the skies, rediscovering the magic of sidescrollers, all while engaging in intense, souls-like combat. Navigate the treacherous Lands of Oblivion, caught between the realms of Light and Darkness. As the first and only hybrid, you are a symbol of unity yet rejected by both worlds. Stand against the animosity of the Pales and the Darks. Immerse yourself in a realm bursting with compelling narratives and a rich, captivating lore. Dive in, and let destiny guide your wings. Wishlist now and embark on an unforgettable journey.


THE LIGHT OF THE DARKNESS: ORIGINS – SETTINGS

Ophelos: the world of Light, Zigardth: the world of Darkness and the Lands of Oblivion.

In the age-old clash between the Darks and the Pales, an insatiable thirst for revenge ensnares legions within the Lands of Oblivion, a crossbreed dimension where those who perish are erased from the memories of all outside this realm. In this turmoil, driven by hope to save his loved ones, a young man named Sephius ventures into this dimension, only to fall into the grasp of Aekon, a relentless dark commander. Yet, rather than meeting his end, he emerges transformed into a being hitherto unseen — a hybrid of Light and Darkness.

Through haunting landscapes and treacherous terrains, Sephius faces gargantuan challenges and unravels the secrets concealed within the Lands of Oblivion. On his quest, he challenges the very paradigms of his existence, teetering between embracing and renouncing both factions. With every stride, he defied that realm's logic, becoming a walking enigma amid two warring worlds.

As Sephius journeyed towards the inevitable showdown with Aekon, it wasn't just a battle for his soul but perhaps for the essence of all who had been swallowed by oblivion. This is the tale of an outcast, narrated through the eyes of a bystander, and not all truths may be as they appear.



THE LIGHT OF THE DARKNESS: ORIGINS – Features Overview


  • Side-Scroller Action RPG:
Dive into intricately crafted levels that beckon you to explore every nook and cranny. As you journey, watch your character grow and evolve, mastering new abilities and facing ever greater challenges.


  • Flying Action:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure in a game where the sky is your playground. With intuitive controls, take to the skies as a winged warrior, mastering the art of flight. Glide effortlessly, dart with precision, or soar majestically in the air brimming with heart-pounding action.


  • Essence Absorption:
Harness the power of fallen foes. Absorb their very essence to augment your strength and acquire new skills. Delve deep into a system that offers a vast array of elemental combinations, allowing for an expansive set of spell variations.


  • Arsenal at Your Fingertips:
Equip yourself with a diverse range of weapons, spells and gear. Each piece offers unique attributes and abilities, providing varied combat strategies and styles. Stand ready, for each choice can tip the balance of battle in your favor.


  • Breathtaking Visual Artistry:
Step into a world digitally painted, brimming with fantasy and wonder. Traverse diverse landscapes. Meet awe-inspiring creatures and enjoy a unique gaming experience backed by an interesting interface.


  • An Epic Odyssey:
Venture into the mesmerizing Lands of Oblivion, a realm veiled in mysticism. Unravel the age-old tales of the Pales and the Darks, and the roots of their relentless strife. Unearth secrets, face challenges, and become the legend you're destined to be.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an adventure like no other in this immersive hand-drawn action RPG. Prepare for thrilling aerial Souls-like combat and exploration that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Enjoy a hand-crafted art set within an intricate lore in this 6-8 hour game perfect as a warm-up for longer titles
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
